forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 7C. SW winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 44F. SSW winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with evening showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Windy. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
